title: Champion Select bug
body:
Okay, we just got in duo queue for a normal game. I clicked accept and then I saw the champion select screen, then all of a sudden it went black, it happened to my friend who I was duoing with too, we waited for like a min and then it put us into lobby, and now we're punished over something we had no control of?  

Did this happen to anyone else? ._.

posted a photo ~

[img]http://i.imgur.com/IYuwvqr.png[/img]

replies.body:
Hey there,

Some players have found a solution to this by simply pressing their return (enter key) key when this occurs. (I am unable to confirm or deny this working as I have not experienced this bug)

If that doesn't help I would recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) on your client.

Let me know if this helps.

Hey, thanks for the reply!~ 

We ended up waiting the timer out and then  hoping it would not happen again, and it didn't :) Probably some random bug, but ill keep this in mind if it ever happens, 

Thanks!~
